mapper.select:
select sci.id, sci.course_date, sci.start_time, sci.end_time, sci.class_id, sci.course_id, cai.name as className, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from schedule_class_info sci left join class_info cai on (cai.id = sci.class_id) left join course_info ci on (ci.id = sci.course_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1 order by sci.course_date desc where 1 = 1
AND si.user_id = #{staffId}
order by sci.course_date desc
union all
select sei.id, sei.course_date, sei.start_time, sei.end_time, sei.course_id, sei.content, sei.create_date, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from schedule_elective_info sei left join course_info ci on (ci.id = sei.course_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.user_id = #{staffId}
order by sei.create_date desc

select si.id, si.code, si.name, si.sex, si.birthday, si.native_address, si.id_card, si.images, si.diploma, si.school_name, si.address, si.email, si.phone, si.create_date, si.del_flag, si.dept_id, si.position_id, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from staff_info si left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1 and si.del_flag = '0' order by si.create_date desc

select si.id, si.code, si.name, si.sex, si.birthday, si.native_address, si.id_card, si.images, si.diploma, si.school_name, si.address, si.email, si.phone, si.create_date, si.del_flag, si.dept_id, si.position_id, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName from staff_info si left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) where 1 = 1 and si.del_flag = '0' and si.id != #{staffId} order by si.create_date desc
